name: corona shooter (Its_very_cool)
description:
That little blue guy is Ninja doctor and his shuriken is vaccine

and his enemy Mr Cocona Vilus

Mr Cocona Vilus likes to go to human lungs and grow larger and larger

so your mission is control Ninja doctor to protect the human inside 

HOSPITAL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

dont let Ninja DOCTOR DEAD

If Game Over please click the restart button

up and down button to control the character

space to shot

sorry :/
